newsitem.title: UK: UK wheat and barley futures see downside correction.
newsitem.headline: UK wheat and barley futures see downside correction.

text.p: LIFFE wheat and barley futures saw some downside correction on Tuesday after the previous day's sharp gains.
"Monday rise was overdone and there are reports that the damage in the U.S. may not be as bad as first thought," said one trader.
Traders said reports of a possible end to the drought in the UK during May also helped to push prices lower.
Old crop wheat futures closed one to 0.25 stg down while new crop was 0.65 to 1.15 stg lower on a total turnover of 651 lots.
Barley closed 0.50 stg down across the board after trading 13 lots.
